scripts.build:ui: @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force build && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build && @powershell Copy-Item build -Recurse ../../part3/phonebook_backend/build
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && fly deploy && fly open && fly logs
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
